text:
AUSTRALIAN OPEN
		  
		  January 17, 2013
		  
		  Ayumi Morita
		  MELBOURNE, VICTORIA
		  A. MORITA/A. Beck
  6‑2, 6‑0

THE MODERATOR:  Questions, please. 

Q.  You might play Serena Williams for the first time in the third round.  Can you talk about your thoughts going into that match? 
AYUMI MORITA:  Yes.

Q.  Can you talk about your thoughts?
AYUMI MORITA:  Yeah, she's of course great player and a great champion.  I just want to try my best out there.
And I never played her, so, yeah, just go on the court and hope I can play well and enjoy the match.

Q.  What are your goals for this year?  Do you have any ranking goals? 
AYUMI MORITA:  Sorry? 

Q.  You're now 72 in the world. 
AYUMI MORITA:  Yeah.

Q.  Just wondering what your ranking goals are this year. 
AYUMI MORITA:  I hope I can get top 50 first, but I didn't play very well this year, so I just want to continue to play good in every match.
Yeah, I will see at the end of my year.

FastScripts Transcript by ASAP Sports
